newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Robeco awaiting completion of Scot Amicable deal.
newsitem.headline: Robeco awaiting completion of Scot Amicable deal.

text.p: Dutch fund management group Robeco said on Tuesday it would make an announcement on the purchase of a property business from Scottish Amicable Investment Managers when the deal is completed.
Scottish Amicable earlier said it would sell its property management business to Robeco for an undisclosed sum.
Robeco spokesman Hans de Klerk confirmed the deal but said he could not add anything until the sale was completed, which he expected this month.
"We will come with an announcement after the full completion of the deal," he told Reuters.
But he added that the purchase was being made by the Robeco group rather than any of the listed companies in the group such as property manager Rodamco NV.
Robeco, the largest independent fund management group in Europe, had about 17 percent of its 76 billion guilders under management at June 30 invested in property.
